013package org.apache.juneau.annotation;
014
015import static java.lang.annotation.ElementType.*;
016import static java.lang.annotation.RetentionPolicy.*;
017import static org.apache.juneau.internal.ArrayUtils.*;
018import static org.apache.juneau.jsonschema.SchemaUtils.*;
019
020import java.lang.annotation.*;
021import java.util.*;
022import java.util.function.*;
023
024import org.apache.juneau.*;
025import org.apache.juneau.collections.*;
026import org.apache.juneau.common.utils.*;
027import org.apache.juneau.parser.*;
028import org.apache.juneau.reflect.*;
029import org.apache.juneau.svl.*;
030
031/**
032 * Utility classes and methods for the {@link Schema @Schema} annotation.
033 *
034 * <h5 class='section'>See Also:</h5><ul>
035 * </ul>
036 */
037public class SchemaAnnotation {
038
039   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
040   // Static
041   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
042
043   /** Default value */
044   public static final Schema DEFAULT = create().build();
045
046   /**
047    * Instantiates a new builder for this class.
048    *
049    * @return A new builder object.
050    */
051   public static Builder create() {
052      return new Builder();
053   }
054
055   /**
056    * Instantiates a new builder for this class.
057    *
058    * @param on The targets this annotation applies to.
059    * @return A new builder object.
060    */
061   public static Builder create(Class<?>...on) {
062      return create().on(on);
063   }
064
065   /**
066    * Instantiates a new builder for this class.
067    *
068    * @param on The targets this annotation applies to.
069    * @return A new builder object.
070    */
071   public static Builder create(String...on) {
072      return create().on(on);
073   }
074
075   /**
076    * Returns <jk>true</jk> if the specified annotation contains all default values.
077    *
078    * @param a The annotation to check.
079    * @return <jk>true</jk> if the specified annotation contains all default values.
080    */
081   public static boolean empty(Schema a) {
082      return a == null || DEFAULT.equals(a);
083   }
084
085   /**
086    * Converts the specified <ja>@Schema</ja> annotation into a generic map.
087    *
088    * @param a The annotation instance.  Can be <jk>null</jk>.
089    * @return The schema converted to a map, or and empty map if the annotation was null.
090    * @throws ParseException Malformed input encountered.
091    */
092   public static JsonMap asMap(Schema a) throws ParseException {
093      if (a == null)
094         return JsonMap.EMPTY_MAP;
095      JsonMap m = new JsonMap();
096      if (SchemaAnnotation.empty(a))
097         return m;
098      Predicate<String> ne = Utils::isNotEmpty;
099      Predicate<Collection<?>> nec = Utils::isNotEmpty;
100      Predicate<Map<?,?>> nem = Utils::isNotEmpty;
101      Predicate<Boolean> nf = Utils::isTrue;
102      Predicate<Long> nm1 = Utils::isNotMinusOne;
103      return m
104         .appendIf(nem, "additionalProperties", parseMap(a.additionalProperties()))
105         .appendIf(ne, "allOf", joinnl(a.allOf()))
106         .appendFirst(ne, "collectionFormat", a.collectionFormat(), a.cf())
107         .appendIf(ne, "default", joinnl(a._default(), a.df()))
108         .appendIf(ne, "discriminator", a.discriminator())
109         .appendIf(ne, "description", joinnl(a.description(), a.d()))
110         .appendFirst(nec, "enum", parseSet(a._enum()), parseSet(a.e()))
111         .appendIf(nf, "exclusiveMaximum", a.exclusiveMaximum() || a.emax())
112         .appendIf(nf, "exclusiveMinimum", a.exclusiveMinimum() || a.emin())
113         .appendIf(nem, "externalDocs", ExternalDocsAnnotation.merge(m.getMap("externalDocs"), a.externalDocs()))
114         .appendFirst(ne, "format", a.format(), a.f())
115         .appendIf(ne, "ignore", a.ignore() ? "true" : null)
116         .appendIf(nem, "items", merge(m.getMap("items"), a.items()))
117         .appendFirst(ne, "maximum", a.maximum(), a.max())
118         .appendFirst(nm1, "maxItems", a.maxItems(), a.maxi())
119         .appendFirst(nm1, "maxLength", a.maxLength(), a.maxl())
120         .appendFirst(nm1, "maxProperties", a.maxProperties(), a.maxp())
121         .appendFirst(ne, "minimum", a.minimum(), a.min())
122         .appendFirst(nm1, "minItems", a.minItems(), a.mini())
123         .appendFirst(nm1, "minLength", a.minLength(), a.minl())
124         .appendFirst(nm1, "minProperties", a.minProperties(), a.minp())
125         .appendFirst(ne, "multipleOf", a.multipleOf(), a.mo())
126         .appendFirst(ne, "pattern", a.pattern(), a.p())
127         .appendIf(nem, "properties", parseMap(a.properties()))
128         .appendIf(nf, "readOnly", a.readOnly() || a.ro())
129         .appendIf(nf, "required", a.required() || a.r())
130         .appendIf(ne, "title", a.title())
131         .appendFirst(ne, "type", a.type(), a.t())
132         .appendIf(nf, "uniqueItems", a.uniqueItems() || a.ui())
133         .appendIf(ne, "xml", joinnl(a.xml()))
134         .appendIf(ne, "$ref", a.$ref())
135      ;
136   }
137
138   private static JsonMap merge(JsonMap m, Items a) throws ParseException {
139      if (ItemsAnnotation.empty(a))
140         return m;
141      Predicate<String> ne = Utils::isNotEmpty;
142      Predicate<Collection<?>> nec = Utils::isNotEmpty;
143      Predicate<Map<?,?>> nem = Utils::isNotEmpty;
144      Predicate<Boolean> nf = Utils::isTrue;
145      Predicate<Long> nm1 = Utils::isNotMinusOne;
146      return m
147         .appendFirst(ne, "collectionFormat", a.collectionFormat(), a.cf())
148         .appendIf(ne, "default", joinnl(a._default(), a.df()))
149         .appendFirst(nec, "enum", parseSet(a._enum()), parseSet(a.e()))
150         .appendFirst(ne, "format", a.format(), a.f())
151         .appendIf(nf, "exclusiveMaximum", a.exclusiveMaximum() || a.emax())
152         .appendIf(nf, "exclusiveMinimum", a.exclusiveMinimum() || a.emin())
153         .appendIf(nem, "items", SubItemsAnnotation.merge(m.getMap("items"), a.items()))
154         .appendFirst(ne, "maximum", a.maximum(), a.max())
155         .appendFirst(nm1, "maxItems", a.maxItems(), a.maxi())
156         .appendFirst(nm1, "maxLength", a.maxLength(), a.maxl())
157         .appendFirst(ne, "minimum", a.minimum(), a.min())
158         .appendFirst(nm1, "minItems", a.minItems(), a.mini())
159         .appendFirst(nm1, "minLength", a.minLength(), a.minl())
160         .appendFirst(ne, "multipleOf", a.multipleOf(), a.mo())
161         .appendFirst(ne, "pattern", a.pattern(), a.p())
162         .appendIf(nf, "uniqueItems", a.uniqueItems() || a.ui())
163         .appendFirst(ne, "type", a.type(), a.t())
164         .appendIf(ne, "$ref", a.$ref())
165      ;
166   }
167
168   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
169   // Builder
170   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
171
172   /**
173    * Builder class.
174    *
175    * <h5 class='section'>See Also:</h5><ul>
176    *    <li class='jm'>{@link org.apache.juneau.BeanContext.Builder#annotations(Annotation...)}
177    * </ul>
178    */
179   public static class Builder extends TargetedAnnotationTMFBuilder<Builder> {
180
181      boolean aev, allowEmptyValue, emax, emin, exclusiveMaximum, exclusiveMinimum, ignore, r, readOnly, required, ro, sie, skipIfEmpty, ui, uniqueItems;
182      ExternalDocs externalDocs=ExternalDocsAnnotation.DEFAULT;
183      Items items=ItemsAnnotation.DEFAULT;
184      long maxi=-1, maxItems=-1, maxl=-1, maxLength=-1, maxp=-1, maxProperties=-1, mini=-1, minItems=-1, minl=-1, minLength=-1, minp=-1, minProperties=-1;
185      String $ref="", cf="", collectionFormat="", discriminator="", f="", format="", max="", maximum="", min="", minimum="", mo="", multipleOf="", p="", pattern="", t="", title="", type="";
186      String[] _default={}, _enum={}, additionalProperties={}, allOf={}, d={}, description={}, df={}, e={}, properties={}, value={}, xml={};
187
188      /**
189       * Constructor.
190       */
191      protected Builder() {
192         super(Schema.class);
193      }
194
195      /**
196       * Instantiates a new {@link Schema @Schema} object initialized with this builder.
197       *
198       * @return A new {@link Schema @Schema} object.
199       */
200      public Schema build() {
201         return new Impl(this);
202      }
203
204      /**
205       * Sets the {@link Schema#_default} property on this annotation.
206       *

208       * @return This object.

211         this._default = value;
212         return this;
213      }

782      public Builder ui(boolean value) {
783         this.ui = value;
784         return this;
785      }
786
787      /**
788       * Sets the {@link Schema#uniqueItems} property on this annotation.
789       *
790       * @param value The new value for this property.
791       * @return This object.
792       */
793      public Builder uniqueItems(boolean value) {
794         this.uniqueItems = value;
795         return this;
796      }
797
798      /**
799       * Sets the {@link Schema#xml} property on this annotation.
800       *
801       * @param value The new value for this property.
802       * @return This object.
803       */
804      public Builder xml(String...value) {
805         this.xml = value;
806         return this;
807      }
808
809      // <FluentSetters>
810
811
812      // </FluentSetters>
813   }
814
815   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
816   // Implementation
817   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
818
819   private static class Impl extends TargetedAnnotationTImpl implements Schema {
820
821      private final boolean aev, allowEmptyValue, exclusiveMaximum, emax, exclusiveMinimum, emin, uniqueItems, ui, required, r, readOnly, ro, sie, skipIfEmpty, ignore;
822      private final ExternalDocs externalDocs;
823      private final Items items;
824      private final long maxLength, maxl, minLength, minl, maxItems, maxi, minItems, mini, maxProperties, maxp, minProperties, minp;
825      private final String $ref, format, f, title, multipleOf, mo, maximum, max, minimum, min, pattern, p, type, t, collectionFormat, cf, discriminator;
826      private final String[] d, _default, df, _enum, e, allOf, properties, additionalProperties, xml;
827
828      Impl(Builder b) {
829         super(b);
830         this.$ref = b.$ref;
831         this._default = copyOf(b._default);
832         this._enum = copyOf(b._enum);
833         this.additionalProperties = copyOf(b.additionalProperties);
834         this.allOf = copyOf(b.allOf);
835         this.aev = b.aev;
836         this.allowEmptyValue = b.allowEmptyValue;
837         this.cf = b.cf;
838         this.collectionFormat = b.collectionFormat;
839         this.d = copyOf(b.d);
840         this.df = copyOf(b.df);
841         this.discriminator = b.discriminator;
842         this.e = copyOf(b.e);
843         this.emax = b.emax;
844         this.emin = b.emin;
845         this.exclusiveMaximum = b.exclusiveMaximum;
846         this.exclusiveMinimum = b.exclusiveMinimum;
847         this.externalDocs = b.externalDocs;
848         this.f = b.f;
849         this.format = b.format;
850         this.ignore = b.ignore;
851         this.items = b.items;
852         this.max = b.max;
853         this.maxi = b.maxi;
854         this.maximum = b.maximum;
855         this.maxItems = b.maxItems;
856         this.maxl = b.maxl;
857         this.maxLength = b.maxLength;
858         this.maxp = b.maxp;
859         this.maxProperties = b.maxProperties;
860         this.min = b.min;
861         this.mini = b.mini;
862         this.minimum = b.minimum;
863         this.minItems = b.minItems;
864         this.minl = b.minl;
865         this.minLength = b.minLength;
866         this.minp = b.minp;
867         this.minProperties = b.minProperties;
868         this.mo = b.mo;
869         this.multipleOf = b.multipleOf;
870         this.p = b.p;
871         this.pattern = b.pattern;
872         this.properties = copyOf(b.properties);
873         this.r = b.r;
874         this.readOnly = b.readOnly;
875         this.required = b.required;
876         this.ro = b.ro;
877         this.sie = b.sie;
878         this.skipIfEmpty = b.skipIfEmpty;
879         this.t = b.t;
880         this.title = b.title;
881         this.type = b.type;
882         this.ui = b.ui;
883         this.uniqueItems = b.uniqueItems;
884         this.xml = copyOf(b.xml);
885         postConstruct();
886      }

1164   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1165   // Appliers
1166   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1167
1168   /**
1169    * Applies targeted {@link Schema} annotations to a {@link org.apache.juneau.Context.Builder}.
1170    */
1171   public static class Apply extends AnnotationApplier<Schema,Context.Builder> {
1172
1173      /**
1174       * Constructor.
1175       *
1176       * @param vr The resolver for resolving values in annotations.
1177       */
1178      public Apply(VarResolverSession vr) {
1179         super(Schema.class, Context.Builder.class, vr);
1180      }
1181
1182      @Override
1183      public void apply(AnnotationInfo<Schema> ai, Context.Builder b) {
1184         Schema a = ai.inner();
1185         if (isEmptyArray(a.on(), a.onClass()))
1186            return;
1187         b.annotations(a);
1188      }
1189   }
1190
1191   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1192   // Other
1193   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1194
1195   /**
1196    * A collection of {@link Schema @Schema annotations}.
1197    */
1198   @Documented
1199   @Target({METHOD,TYPE})
1200   @Retention(RUNTIME)
1201   @Inherited
1202   public static @interface Array {
1203
1204      /**
1205       * The child annotations.
1206       *
1207       * @return The annotation value.
1208       */
1209      Schema[] value();
1210   }
1211}
